Hello every body! :)

Just thought I would throw an FYI out here. I am abou=
t to open up what could be a larger story ark involving the minions, which =
of course means it will imapct many others >:)

I will be creating - or per=
haps INDUCTING would be a better choice of words - others into the minion r=
anks to create some mayhem for all. They will be revealed soon. 

I will be=
 happy to take on the temporary roles of whatever is needed to keep the lin=
es rolling, although I will probably try to keep that to a minimum as much =
as I can, as there are many already out there to be utilized. 

Sandy, I ha=
ve been trying to send you some offline mail to that email address you sent=
 me, but I don't know if the mail is being sent to spam-land or just lost. =
I had some pictures of a possible new form that might interest you, and am =
just looking for your input and thoughts. Also I was wondering at how much =
you know about the BW's toon, so I know if I have to feed you any backgroun=
d information from time to time. I just wanted to be sure we are on the sam=
e sheet before we stepped forward :)

Also as for the rest, I know Airly ha=
s some stuff that she is trying to accomplish as well as Sandy and Kraftlos=
, as I have gotten stuff from each at different times. My goal is to touch =
on all of them, and keep it fun as much as I can. I am not GMing, but I am =
doing as much as I can to keep stuff moving - much like I did before. 

The=
 question I have is: What does everyone want to see from this and from me? =
In other words: What are your thoughts?

Preston
